short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get rid of those debt and community chuck stakers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Attempts to filter out debt/community chuck staking streamers from the 2007scape section of Twitch.

It currently uses a blacklist of common words which can be expanded upon request.

This project is open source. The code can be viewed here: https://github.com/ejedev/NoStake
